users.snippet0:
This is the snippet area.
Use the buttons on top to turn on/off the highlighting and the dropdown menu to choose the language (changes the keywords to highlight).
Press "Create New" to create a snippet, setting its name and code. Press "Save" to save newly created snippet or save progress in current one.
